question: WRITING TASK 1 You should spend 20 minutes on this task. You have decided to apply for a job as a Spanish instructor that was advertised in the magazine Teaching S.A. Write a letter to apply for the job. In your letter: explain why you are writing describe your experience and qualifications explain how they can contact you. Write at least 150 words.
text: I am writing in regards to the vacancy for a Spanish instructor in the MGM School, which I saw advertised in 'Teaching S.A' date 15th April. I hereby extended my interest in this position and am attaching herein a copy of my CV and certifications.

I am currently working as a Spanish instructor at the Nemom School in Trivandrum. I have over 5 years of experience in the role of a Spanish teacher. I  completed my graduation with BA in Spanish and pursuing my MA with the same specialization. I started my career in 2005 as a 'Junior Spanish Instructor' my current designation is 'Senior Spanish Instructor'.

I am seeking to move to a bigger school with international standards. I believe I meet and exceed the key skills and attributes needed for the post. I can showcase my skills during the interview, which is the next step per advertisement. Once my interview is scheduled please inform me through phone or mail. I would be available anytime on phone number 8289979466 or you can write to Vishakam, TC53/2947, Nemom.
I am looking forward to your reply!
